incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Start time : 12/06/2023 06:00 UTC End time : 22/07/2023 17:00 UTC Service impact : During NSX upgrade , Hosts will be put in maintenance mode and reboot During vSphere and Zerto migrations , management will be inaccessible for 3 hours. During ESXi migrations , In some case Binaries will be pushed locally or Hosts will be rebooted, (no impact as the hosts are in maintenance mode). Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we are rolling an upgrade for the VMware vCenter Server Appliance solution and ESXi for customers with and without Zerto service
